projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

lg.l: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam // [1] //

div.p:
kliṣṭameva hi vijñānaṃ [draṣṭavyaṃ] janmaṇi (ni) śrayāt /
khadhātuḥ pṛthagākāśādrūpāyatanasaṃgrahāt / [14] //

lg.l: nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vimāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamā(mā) dhyāsya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //

nirvikalpaguṇasvārthāḥ asmārādanirūpaṇāt /
manobhaumī smṛtiḥ pūrvo dvitīyo ghīrṇi(rni)rūpikā / [20] //

lg.l: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam // [26] //
spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ // [36] //

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: na hyū rdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ // [48] //
nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ // [49] //
tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcanā // [63] //
na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān // [69] //
śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu // [70] //
dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam // [86] //
anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam // [90] //
daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā // [91] //

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ // [111] //

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasya [adhyāyasya] dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā // [114] //
ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate // [131] //
kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
svarūpaṃ vedayaṃścchabdo vyañjanā dīni ca dhruvam /
na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /

div.p: abhidharmadīpe [vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya ca]turthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //

kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
karmāṇyetāni lokasya kāraṇaṃ neśvarādayaḥ / [155] //

lg.l: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam // [163] //
bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham // [170] //
adho 'pi madhyamaṃ karma dhyānenā ntyepi nirvṛteḥ /
satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate // [181] //
navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayā [ghā]tinī /
śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekavai(dhai)te samāhitāḥ // [190] //
prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // [194] //
phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dvetrīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ // [207] //
śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ // [208] //
ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ // [211] //
trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ // [212] //
karttṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu // [215] //

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati // [227] //
buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute // [229] //
bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ // [291] //
ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmalau /

div.p:
sādharmye sati tadvṛttervyāhāraṃ madhuroktivat /
āviṣṭaliṅgamukhyasya janmeṣṭaṃ dārakādivat / [311] //

lg.l: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām // [313] //
ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā // [320] //
tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā // [323] //
dharmāḥ pañcadhā nirmalāścaiva vijñānāni tathaiva ca // [326] //
catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ // [336] //

div.p:
ārūpyāḥ sarvagāḥ sārdhaṃ bhāvanāpathasaṃkṣayai[:]
parivṛtte trayo 'dhastāt catvāraśca svadhātutaḥ // [337] //

lg.l: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyodardhvaṃ pañca pañca vā // [353] //
ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa // [354] //

div.p: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //

lg.l: vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
sāvidyā dve upādāne yathākto(ktau) dve tu dṛṅmaye /
ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṃkṣā(kāṅkṣā)kāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca // [381] //
